page.title: 18BUMPERS FARM INDUSTRIAL SITE
page.content: {BUMPERS FARM INDUSTRIAL ESTATE}IS BUILT ON THE SITE OF OLD BUMPERS FARM, {1/2 KM WEST OUT OF CHIPPENHAM}. A LOT OF COMPANIES HAVE ALREADY MOVED INTO FINISHED PREMISES ON THE SITE . THERE ARE A WIDE RANGE OF COMPANIES SUCH AS D.I.Y.{BATH AREA HEALTH AUTHORITY},CAR HIRE COMPANIES ETC . THERE ARE STILL NEW BUILDINGS BEING CONSTRUCTED . MANY {FACILITIES}THAT THE TOWN OF{CHIPPENHAM BADLY NEEDED ARE NOW TO BE FOUND ON THE{INDUSTRAIL SITE}. THERE ARE VERY GOOD CAR PARKING FACILITIES AVAILABLE , MOST COMPANIES HAVE THEIR OWN CAR PARK ADJACENT TO THEIR BUILDING . THE {INDUSTRIAL ESTATE}HAS DONE A LOT TOWARDS{REDUCING THE UNEMPLOYMENT}IN CHIPPENHAM , ALTHOUGH IT HAS SPOILED A WIDE AREA OF PASTURE LAND.
